rules_text:
When Wandering Shrine enters or is turned face up, conjure a card named Far-Off Lands into your hand. [i](It's a land with “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
{4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wandering Shrine for each land you control named Far-Off Lands. You may have it become a 0/0 Construct creature with trample in addition to its other types until end of turn.
